name: Monster Dentist - Little Halloween Doctor Kid Game
name_original: Monster Dentist - Little Halloween Doctor Kid Game
description:
Become a monster dentist in this simulator game!! The monsters ate too much candy on Halloween and need you to help brush, color & clean cute little monster teeth!

Use dentist tools including tooth brush, floss, bad breath mouth sprayer and more as you go through the cleaning stages.

**Features**
- Various cleaning tools including toothbrush, floss, tooth-picker, suction, water-sprayer and more!
- Add braces by using your finger to pick up the brace. Add the braces to the crooked teeth to straighten them!
- Remove food pieces stuck on the teeth with floss or tooth-picker
- Color teeth with fun colors or make them pearly white!
- Make sure to fully clean the teeth to complete each stage for your character!
- Take a Photo to Save Your Best Design or Finished Monster Teeth to your Album!
- Play again for endless dentist scenarios!

*Please note that Monster Dentist School is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items and remove ads with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.*

Ninjafish Studios is very concerned about our users' privacy. To understand our policies and obligations, please read our Terms Of Service and Privacy Policy carefully.

Privacy Policy: http://www.ninjafish.com/privacy
